'''{{class|Inventory}}'''
{{c|native static void '''PrintPickupMessage''' (bool ''localview'', String ''str'')}}
== Usage == An {{class|Inventory}} function called when an item is picked up in the world (normally is called automatically in the item's [[Touch]] virtual). Prints the item's {{property|PickupMessage}} on the screen of the player who picked it up. This function can be called manually to perform the print.
Note, this is ''not'' a virtual function; if you need to modify the actual message that gets printed, there's a separate virtual function that can be overridden for that: [[PickupMessage|{{c|PickupMessage()}}]].
=== Parameters === *{{c|bool '''localview'''}} :If true, the message will only be printed for the actor who picks up the item.
*{{c|String '''str'''}} :A [[String|text string]] to be printed.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== See also == * [[PickupMessage]] * [[Touch]]
